info.name: Facebook show only MFW on Facebook filter
info.description:
Facebook show only Mafia Wars on Mafia Wars filter feed.
A simple adaptation of the Joe Simmon's Farmville filter.
by J.C. Coelho 2010

This is the filter url it will work on: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?filter=app_10979261223&show_hidden=true&sk=lf
